授業目的: The purpose of this course is for students to learn to write more fluently and competently in the English language by learning structure, and how to write different types of essays.
到達目標: Students will be able to understand what a good structured essay is and how to write one.
特記事項: 本授業科目は、“オンライン授業60単位制限対象科目”ではありません。 The course is not subject to the 60-credit limit for online courses.
授業の概要・背景: From this year 2023, classes will be conducted on campus and face to face.
授業方法: Students will be given tasks which will harness their interests and allow them to write about them.  Though we will use a text in the classroom, students will have plenty of freedom to choose their own topics while completing the tasks.

第1回: Class policy, goal and interview with teacher.
第2回: How to write an anecdote essay.
トピック.授業外学習2: Students must complete all homework assignments they are given, which are to be determined on each class day.
